Reviews.Title: “Never stay there!!”
Reviews.Author: AnnieRussia
Reviews.Content: times time stolen tshirt housekeeper woman cosmetics time price 1 night twice told forget money invoice shouted etc poor furniture hotel bathrooms renovated breakfast cucumbers olives egg tea please dont save money respect yourself friendly cosy hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Simple B&B but brilliant location.”
Reviews.Author: KLaura01
Reviews.Content: paid 45 euros night based 2 sharing basic bb standard turkish breakfast coffeetea morning hairdryer tv plenty cupboard space cleaned day ac lobby downstairs stayed 3 nights taksim stop istanbul via wed short break location bb perfect seeing bbs location looked happy chose busy location noisey night didnt visiting istanbul sights shopping alike bb perfect short cheap stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good value”
Reviews.Author: Shimbles
Reviews.Content: nice little hotel spot near bars beyoglu helpful reception staff dealt firmly taxi driver clean tidy albeit fairly basic value price earlymorning building street outside disturbed morning probably commonplace hazard city
